title: Picton Plans More AI, Technology Hiring in Canadian Firm’s Growth Push
summary: Canadian hedge fund manager David Picton says artificial intelligence will be a disruptive force for the money management industry, and his firm is looking to expand its technology capabilities as part of its growth plan.
